Class Panel

    public class Panel
extends FocusableComponentProxy
    A panel that can be opened and closed.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Panel

        public Panel(IComponent title,
             IComponent content,
             IBoolean active,
             IToggleable open,
             Animation animation,
             IPanelRenderer panelRenderer)
        Creates a generic panel.
        Parameters:
        title - the title component of the panel
        content - the content of the panel
        active - whether this panel is active
        open - the toggleable to use for opening and closing the panel
        animation - the animation to use for opening and closing the panel
        panelRenderer - the render to use for the overlay of this panel
